model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObservable

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameObservable
    Contains all the game logic.
    Author:
    quentin sauvage
    See Also:
    GameObserver, Player, MapJson
